DIUser

@interface DIUser : NSObject

A wrapper class that provides all the User Identity and Authentication Management services for your application.

@since 1.0.0

  • isEmailVerified

    isEmailVerified indicates if current user’s email is verified. User (non-China) is not completely logged in if their email is not verified.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

  • isMobileNumberVerified

    isMobileNumberVerified indicates if current user’s mobile number is verified via OTP. Only applicable for China users. User is not completely logged in if mobile number is not verified.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @property (readonly, assign, nonatomic) BOOL isMobileNumberVerified;

    Swift

  • isVerified

    isVerified indicates if user’s account is verified either via email or mobile number. Mobile number verification is applicable only to China users.

    @since 1.0.0

  • isLoggedIn

    isLoggedIn indicates user’s login state. This is one and only source of truth to know if user is actually logged in. Because user fields and state are share among components and application, it is encouraged to check user’s login state before reading/updating any user fields.

    @since 1.0.0 @deprecated 1804.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @property (readonly, assign, nonatomic) BOOL isLoggedIn;

    Swift

    var isLoggedIn: Bool { get }
  • userLoggedInState

    userLoggedInState indicates user’s state while logging in. Based on the states, it is decided what actions need to be taken and whether user is logged in or not.

    @since 1804.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @property (readonly, assign, nonatomic) int userLoggedInState;

    Swift

    var userLoggedInState: Int32 { get }
  • gender

    gender of currently logged in user. UserGenderNone is returned if user is not logged in or no information on gender can be found.

    @since 1.0.0

  • -addUserRegistrationListener:

    Adds a listener to get callbacks for user authentication and janrain flow download call backs. Adding a listener more than once will not have any effect.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)addUserRegistrationListener:
    (nonnull id<UserRegistrationDelegate, JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate>)listener;

    Swift

    func addRegistrationListener(_ listener: JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate & UserRegistrationDelegate)

    Parameters

    listener

    Object of the class that wants to get the callbacks and implements specified protocols.

  • -removeUserRegistrationListener:

  • -logout

    This method is called to logout currently logged in user. User will be logged out of both Janrain and HSDP (if config provided) backends. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserRegistrationDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)logout;

    Swift

    func logout()
  • -refreshLoginSession

    This method is called to refresh session/tokens of currently logged in user. Both Janrain and HSDP sessions will be refreshed. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate SessionRefreshDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)refreshLoginSession;

    Swift

    func refreshLoginSession()
  • -updateReciveMarketingEmail:

    Updates marketing opt-in of currently logged in user. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Parameters

  • -updateGender:withBirthday:

    Updates gender and birthday of currently logged in user. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Parameters

    Gender value to be updated to.
    birthday

    Birthday to be added or updated to.
  • -replaceConsumerInterest:

    Replaces exisitng consumer interests list with new list. If you want to add or remove a consumer interest to this list, please create new list from existing list by adding or removing one or more consumer interests and replace old list with new one. Janrain SDK only supports replacing list as a way for update and hence the restiriction mentioned above. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @discussion Most applications should not require to use consumer interests. Per our records, Figaro is only application using this. Do let us know, if your application is also using it. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)replaceConsumerInterest:(nonnull NSArray *)newElements;

    Swift

    func replaceConsumerInterest(_ newElements: [Any])

    Parameters

    newElements

    New list of consumer interests.
  • -getConsumerInterestForUser:

    Gets list of consumer interests by the topicCommunicationKey for currently logged in user.

    @discussion Most applications should not require to use consumer interests. Per our records, Figaro is only application using this. Do let us know, if your application is also using it.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (nullable NSArray *)getConsumerInterestForUser:(nonnull NSString *)key;

    Swift

    func getConsumerInterest(forUser key: String) -> [Any]?

    Parameters

    key

    topicCommunicationKey for which consumer interests are to be returned.

    Return Value

    consumerInterests of user for provided topicCommunicationKey. @since 1.0.0

  • -refetchUserProfile

    Refetches logged in user’s latest profile from server. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @discussion This is an expensive request given that user profile could be very big that includes large size profile image etc. Therefore, it is highly encouraged to call this only when it is must to display latest prfile details to user. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)refetchUserProfile;

    Swift

    func refetchProfile()
  • -checkIfJanrainFlowDownloadedWithCompletion:

    This method is called to check if PhilipsRegistration has downloaded all the URLs, configurations and flows needed to serve API calls. This call will automatically retry if last try to download the flow has failed. So, do not call it too many times if it returns failure.

    @discussion Most applications need not use this API unless they are builiding their own UI. All PhilipsRegistration APIs already incorporate this call. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)checkIfJanrainFlowDownloadedWithCompletion:
    (void (^_Nonnull)(NSError *_Nullable))completion;

    Swift

    func checkIfJanrainFlowDownloaded(completion: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)

    Parameters

    completion

    A block to be executed when it is determined that flow download has either failed or succeeded. Existance of error object indicates the success or failure.
  • -updateCountry:withCompletion:

    This method is called to change currently selected country for the user. This call would redownload all the URLs, configurations and flows specific to selected country.

    @discussion “Most applications need not use this API unless they are builiding their own UI. All PhilipsRegistration UI already incorporate this functionality. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)updateCountry:(nonnull NSString *)country
       withCompletion:(void (^_Nullable)(NSError *_Nullable))completionHandler;

    Swift

    func updateCountry(_ country: String, withCompletion completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)? = nil)

    Parameters

    country

    The newly selected country to be updated.
    completionHandler

    A block that will be executed when country update has completed with either success or failure.
  • -countryCodeWithCompletion:

    This method is called to get current country code from ServiceDiscovery. ServiceDiscovery with try to determine the country if not already done. This call would download all the URLs, configurations and flows specific to selected country if not already done.

    @discussion Most applications need not use this API unless they are builiding their own UI. All PhilipsRegistration UI already incorporate this functionality. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)countryCodeWithCompletion:
    (void (^_Nonnull)(NSString *_Nullable, NSError *_Nullable))completion;

    Swift

    func countryCode(completion: @escaping (String?, Error?) -> Void)

    Parameters

    completion

    A block that will be executed when country reading has completed with either success or failure.
  • -updateMobileNumber:

    Updates user’s mobile number. Only available to China users. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserRegistrationDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.

    @discussion Most applications need not use this API unless they are builiding their own UI. All PhilipsRegistration UI already incorporate this functionality. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)updateMobileNumber:(nonnull NSString *)mobileNumber;

    Swift

    Parameters

    mobileNumber

  • -addRecoveryEmailToMobileNumberAccount:

    Adds recovery email to user’s mobile number account. Only available to China users. This is an asynchronous call. Please implement appropriate UserDetailsDelegate callbacks to be informed about success or failure of this action.“

    @discussion Most applications need not use this API unless they are builiding their own UI. All PhilipsRegistration UI already incorporate this functionality. @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    Parameters

  • -updateUserConsent:withCompletion:

    Updates user’s COPPA consent to indicate if user has accepted or declined the (first) COPPA consent.

    @since 1.0.0

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    - (void)updateUserConsent:(BOOL)accepted
           withCompletion:(void (^_Nullable)(NSError *_Nullable))completion;

    Swift

    func updateConsent(_ accepted: Bool, withCompletion completion: ((Error?) -> Void)? = nil)

    Parameters

    accepted

    Bool value to indicate consent was accepted or declined.
    completion

    This block will be called when user consent has been updated or failed to update to server. Existance of error object indicates the success or failure.
  • -updateUserConsentApproval:withCompletion:

    completion

    This block will be called when user approval has been updated or failed to update to server. Existance of error object indicates the success or failure.
  • +application:openURL:options:

    Handles openURL call from other applications. Used for handling native social login like WeChat or Google+ that are executed via SafaraiServices or native social apps. Call this method from AppDelegate of your application from method of similar signature.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    + (BOOL)application:(id)application
            openURL:(nonnull NSURL *)url
            options:(nonnull NSDictionary *)options;

    Swift

    class func application(_ application: Any!, open url: URL, options: [AnyHashable : Any] = [:]) -> Bool

    Parameters

    application

    Application object received in AppDelegate.
    url

    URL object received in AppDelegate.
    options

    Options received in AppDelegate.

    Return Value

    Bool value to indicate if PhilipsRegistration has been able to handle this request. @since 1.0.0

  • -authorizeWithHSDPWithCompletion:

    Handles hsdp login if the user is not loggedin to hsdp and have configured for skiphsdplogin to true

                           withPassword:(nonnull NSString *)password;

    Swift

    password

    The password
    firstname

    Given (first) name of the user
    lastName

    Family (last) name of the user
    isOlderThanAgeLimit

    Set if user is older than given age limit
    receiveMarketingEmails

    Set if user has agreed to receive marketing emails
